column5: PM me if you would like to join this years league. 25 bucks for the season, winner take all  pm me for password

I'm in! The Salary Cap pool was great last year and a cool twist on football pools - for anyone that has played it before, you know what I mean.  Also - if anyone is interested in a free standard league system as well, we can set one up for fun - we need at least 10 guys to make it viable. I've already got 3 or 4 guys who would be in.  PM me if interested....  first come first served, 14 people max.
I'm in CH.  Good to see you already tied for first place too, any predictions this year on your finish??
We know it won't be first...
my predicton... well maybe not second to last like last year! it hurt considering all the hours I spent on it!
nope salary cap.. you pick players onece a week, you can keep the same players if you wish. Like the stock market the players values go up and down join in Dax its loads of fun
